ðŸ“– Summary: The WiFi-3D-Fusion repository focuses on estimating 3D human pose using WiFi Channel State Information (CSI) signals and deep learning techniques. It aims to fuse wireless sensing with computer vision to achieve advanced spatial awareness, enabling applications like activity recognition and human-computer interaction.
